DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare Ultra-perc single stage dilator technique Ciaglia Blue Dolphin ballon dilatation technique intubate unweanable ICU patient respect procedure difficulty complication .
DOC.brief_title: Percutaneous Dilatational Tracheostomy : Ultra-perc Versus Ciaglia Blue Dolphin
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator conduct prospective randomize trial compare Ultra-perc single stage dilator technique ( UP ) Ciaglia Blue Dolphin ballon dilatation technique ( CBD ) From January 2013 December 2015 . The investigator compare two group regard Procedure difficulty include difficult dilatation , difficult tube insertion , fail tube insertion , false passage tracheal stoma dilatation . Procedure complication include cardiac arrest , pneumothorax , pneumomediastinum , subcutaneous emphysema , hemorrhage lung atelectasis .
DOC.criteria: sepsis cerebrovascular accident cervical cord injury traumatic brain injury post arrest chronic obstructive pulmonary disease patient family refusal emergency tracheostomy distort abnormal anatomy bleed diathesis morbid obesity previous tracheostomy infect surgical site Adult respiratory distress syndrome patient require high positive end expiratory pressure high oxygen demand
